traits.name: Brutality
traits.desc: If your target is not adjacent to an ally, your attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19-20

traits.name: Greataxe Slash
traits.desc: +6 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage

traits.name: Savage Assault
traits.desc: +6 to hit, reach 5ft., two targets, or the same target twice. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage

traits.name: Headbutt
traits.desc: DC 12 vs Strength saving throw, reach 5ft., one creature. Hits 1d10 bludgeoning and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

traits.name: Greataxe Spin
traits.desc: DC 12 vs. Dexterity Saving throw, reach 10 ft., all targets. Hit: 15 (2d12 + 2) slashing damage.
